Articles.Content: So I have been using interstellar for quite a while now. Maybe for about 4 months or so, and now I have gotten to the point where I can use the DT-Vista engine. I have been having a problem where the engine blows up from too much heat even when I have 6 huge radiators! Please help. Thank You!

Moving this over to General Add-on Affairs, as it's specific to add-on-related content. Hope you get the answers you're looking for!

(Also, welcome to the forums! )
Vista has a high heat production, you must add many radiators. More, be sure your Interstellar is updated to the latest version.
So about how many radiators? And I just got the new version of Interstellar.
Perfect, use the VAB Thermal Helper to find the right amount of radiators needed.
